about.title: Character Stats
about.intro: Ayo! If you're reading this, you're not an NPC. I'm Eugene (**thejenja**), a dev with infinite aura points focused on **Vue** and **UI Looksmaxxing**. I like it when the tech hits different and doesn't just cringe.
about.approach: My strategy is **Gigachad Architecture**. I don't vibe with Tailwind and blind utility spam (mid behavior). Why? My xp farming **UserCSS** proved: when the code has no semantics but just a class soup, that's an L. So I main **Raw CSS/SCSS** to mog the DOM. I respect hand-crafted code that passes the vibe check.
about.interests: I live in the simulation between code and **Skynet**. For me, AI isn't just a toy, it's my duo partner: I use it to cook up ideas, prototype, and even refactor my spaghetti code. Besides the web, I make **Lyrics-edits** (visuals go brrr) and used to be an admin for **Minecraft** servers. Yes, blocks taught me how to fix memory leaks before it was cool.
about.conclusion: TL;DR: I'm that **CSS Sigma** who uses **AI pipelines** to speedrun work but never sacrifices the quality of the grind. I stand for **open-source**, visual experiments that slap, and websites that make you go 'sheesh'. If you need a dev with W rizz — let's lock in.
